articles.title: Seattle Becomes First US City To Ban Caste Discrimination - NDTV
articles.description: Seattle has become the first US city to outlaw caste discrimination after its local council passed a resolution, moved by an Indian-American politician and economist, to add caste to its non-discrimination policy.
articles.content:
The resolution to ban caste discrimination was moved by Kshama Sawant.

articles.title: Indian-American Vivek Ramaswamy Announces 2024 US Presidential Bid - NDTV
articles.description: Indian-American tech entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy has launched his 2024 presidential bid with a promise to "put merit back" and end dependence on China.
articles.content:
He is the second Indian-American to enter the Republican presidential primary.
